# CLAccuracyAuthorization.reducedAccuracy

**Case**

The user authorized the app to access location data with reduced accuracy.

## Declaration

```swift
case reducedAccuracy
```

## Related Documentation

- **accuracyAuthorization**: A value that indicates the level of location accuracy the app has permission to use.

## Getting the location accuracy

- **CLAccuracyAuthorization.fullAccuracy**: The user authorized the app to access location data with full accuracy.
